import React, { useState } from 'react' const Contact = () => { const [data, setData] = useState({ name:"", phone:"", email:"", message:"" }); const InputEvent = (event) => { const {name, value}= event.target; setData((preVal)=>{ return{ ...preVal, [name] : value, } }) } const formSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() alert( `My name is ${data.name}. My mobile number is ${data.phone}. my ` ) } return ( <>

Contact Us

) } export default Contact
